name: Learning Process
description: Die 5 times.

name: "Is This Bugged?"
description: Fail the Shrine of Chance 3 times in a row.

name: The Basics
description: Discover 10 unique white items.

name: ...Maybe One More.
description: Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D Printer.

name: Flawless
description: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

name: Keyed Up
description: Defeat the Teleporter boss under 15 seconds.

name: Advancement
description: Complete a Teleporter event.

name: Rapidfire
description: Reach +200% attack speed.

name: Prismatically Aligned
description: Complete a Prismatic Trial.

name: Experimenting
description: Pick up 5 different types of Equipment.

name: Slaughter
description: Defeat 3000 enemies.

name: Glorious Battle
description: Charge the Teleporter with less than 10% health.

name: Death Do Us Part
description: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

name: Death Do Us Part
description: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

name: Going Fast Recommended
description: Reach +300% movespeed (includes sprinting).

name: Cut Down
description: Defeat 500 elite monsters.

name: Warmonger
description: Complete 3 Combat Shrines in a single stage.

name: Automation Activation
description: Activate 6 turrets in a single run.

name: Her Concepts
description: Find the Altar to N'kuhana.

name: Macho
description: Deal 5000 damage in one shot.

name: The Long Road
description: Complete 20 stages in a single run.

name: Deja Vu?
description: Loop back to the first stage.

name: Newtist
description: Discover and activate 8 unique Newt Altars.

name: The Lone Survivor
description: Stay alive for 30 consecutive minutes.

name: Deicide
description: Defeat an Elite boss on Monsoon difficulty.

name: Naturopath
description: Without healing, reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event.

name: The Demons And The Crabs
description: Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map.

name: Blockade Breaker
description: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Blockade Breaker
description: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Never Back Down
description: In 4 consecutive stages donâ€™t leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

name: Moon Worshipper
description: Carry 5 Lunar items in a single run.

name: Mechanic
description: Repair 30 drones or turrets.

name: [REDACTED]
description: Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta.

name: Ascendant
description: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Mountain.

name: Funded!
description: Collect $30,480 total gold.

name: One with the Woods
description: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

name: Bookworm
description: Collect 10 Monster or Environment Logs.

name: Bookworm
description: Collect 10 Monster or Environment Logs.

name: Cleanup Duty
description: Destroy 20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

name: The Calm
description: Beat the game on Monsoon difficulty.

name: I Love Dying!
description: Die 20 times.

name: ...To Be Left Alone
description: Stabilize the Cell in the Void Fields.

name: Pause.
description: Free the survivor suspended in time.

name: Engineering Perfection
description: Complete 30 stages.

name: Warrior
description: Reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event without dying.

name: Guidance Offline
description: Defeat the unique guardian of Siren's Call.

name: True Respite
description: Obliterate yourself at the Obelisk..

name: Power Plant
description: Repair the broken robot with an Escape Pod's Fuel Array.

name: Washed Away
description: Beat the game.

name: Acrid: Easy Prey
description: As Acrid, land the killing blow on 50 total enemies that have 1 hit point left.

name: Acrid: Bad Medicine
description: As Acrid, land the final blow on a Scavenger.

name: Acrid: Pandemic
description: As Acrid, inflict Poison 1000 total times.

name: Artificer: Massacre
description: As Artificer, perform a multikill of 20 enemies.

name: Artificer: Chunked!
description: As Artificer, fully defeat the teleporter boss in a one-second burst of damage.

name: Artificer: Orbital Bombardment
description: As Artificer, kill 15 enemies before touching the ground.

name: Commando: Rolling Thunder
description: As Commando, land the killing blow on an Overloading Worm.

name: Commando: Godspeed
description: As Commando, fully charge the first-stage teleporter before the timer hits 5 minutes.

name: Commando: Incorruptible
description: As Commando, clear 20 stages in a single run without picking up any Lunar items.

name: Engineer: 100% Calculated
description: As Engineer, defeat the teleporter boss in less than 5 seconds after it spawns.

name: Engineer: Zero Sum
description: As Engineer, finish charging the teleporter with zero monsters remaining on the stage.

name: Engineer: Better With Friends
description: As Engineer, recruit 12 minions at one time.

name: Huntress: Finishing Touch
description: As Huntress, land a killing blow with every possible hit of a single glaive.

name: Huntress: One Shot, One Kill
description: As Huntress, collect and carry 12 Crowbars at once.

name: Huntress: Piercing Wind
description: As Huntress, start and finish either Rallypoint Delta or Scorched Acres without falling below 100% health.

name: Loader: Swing By
description: As Loader, reach and proceed through the Celestial Portal in 25 minutes or less.

name: Loader: Earthshatter
description: As Loader, land a Charged Gauntlet hit at 300mph or higher.

name: Mercenary: Demon of the Skies
description: As Mercenary, don't touch the ground for 30 seconds.

name: Mercenary: Ethereal
description: As Mercenary, complete a Prismatic Trial without falling below 100% health.

name: MUL-T: Pest Control
description: As MUL-T, defeat two Beetle Queens without leaving the teleporter zone.

name: MUL-T: Gotcha!
description: As MUL-T, land the killing blow on an Imp Overlord with the Preon Accumulator.

name: REX: Bushwhacked
description: As REX, complete an entire teleporter event while under 50% health.

name: REX: Dunked
description: As REX, kill a Clay Dunestrider on Abandoned Aqueduct by throwing it into a pit.

name: Captain: Wanderlust
description: As Captain, visit 10 different environments in a single run.

name: Captain: Worth Every Penny
description: As Captain, repair and recruit a TC-280 Prototype.
